name: Platform Scroller
description:
Jump and move around to avoid incoming platforms, if you get forced to the left of the screen you lose. As you get a higher score the block speeds will increase so watch out!

Controls: move left and right with A, D or left and right arrow keys. Jump with space.

This was made on a 2 hour coach ride as I decided I had nothing better to do. If I'm up to it, this may be the premise of a more polished game.
